AbnormalFile.Title: error
AbnormalFile.Message: The program has been broken, may be because the program is infected by the virus, can not continue to use!

AbnormalPath.Title: error
AbnormalPath.Message: Abnormal path! please install the file into the English path

TempPath.Title: error
TempPath.Message: It is forbidden to run in temporary folder. Please unzip the whole TurboHUD folder before running!

AppdataPath.Title: error
AppdataPath.Message: Cannot run in AppData folder, Please transfer the whole TurboHUD folder to another path before running!

AbnormalFileName.Title: error
AbnormalFileName.Message: Please rename this program file, not named TurboHUD.exe

FailedToGetUpdateList.Title: error
FailedToGetUpdateList.Message: Failed to get file update list, please check network connection!

ForceUpdateMessage.Title: Update
ForceUpdateMessage.Message: The version you are using is out of date. Please update it to the latest version!

UpdateMessage.Title: Update
UpdateMessage.Message: There is a new version. Do you want to update it?

SelectFirst.Title: error
SelectFirst.Message: Please select a item in the list first!

IEproxy.Title: IE proxy
IEproxy.Message:
Detected that your IE browser has set up a proxy, which may cause your built-in browser from accessing the web page!
Do you want to turn off the proxy now?

IEscript.Title: IE auto script
IEscript.Message:
Detected that your IE browser has set up auto script，which may cause your built-in browser from accessing the web page!
Do you want to turn off the auto script now?

UsernameOrPasswordCanNotBeEmpty.Message: User name or password cannot be empty!

SecondaryLogonFailed.Title: error
SecondaryLogonFailed.Message: Secondary Logon service failed to start!

SystemAccountCreated.Title: success
SystemAccountCreated.Message: The system account has been created successfully!

32to64.Message: You have selected Diablo III 32-bit file, which will be automatically replaced by 64 bit program!

NotD3.Message: Your game path file is not Diablo III64.exe, please re-enter!

TurboMGRIP.Title: Connecting IP ports
TurboMGRIP.Tips: Please enter the address or domain name and port to connect to TurboHUD (default 127.0.0.1:8081). If you need to connect to TurboHUD running on other computer in the Internet, Please set port 8081 in the router to map to the host to be connected, Or configure the router DMZ host

TurboMGRLocal.Title: warning
TurboMGRLocal.Message: Please load TurboHUD on this computer first!

TurboMGRFail.Title: warning
TurboMGRFail.Message: Unable to load, Please check whether \TurboHUD\TurboMGR\TurboMGR.exe file is blocked by antivirus software!

ConfigFileLoadingFailed.Title: Error
ConfigFileLoadingFailed.Message: Configuration file loading failed! Will try to restore the default configuration!

NTFS.Title: NTFS
NTFS.Message: It is detected that the partition where the plugins is not in NTFS format. Cannot use "TurboMGR". Do you want to convert it to NTFS format?

AntiVirusSoftware.Title: anti-virus software
AntiVirusSoftware.Message: It is detected that the program may be blocked by antivirus software. Please add the directory where the program is located to the confession list / trust directory / exclusion directory

WindowsCompatibility.Title: error
WindowsCompatibility.Message: TurboHUD may not run on your windows system! If you are running in compatibility mode, please do not set the system lower than Windows7sp1! Please use windows7sp1 or above windows system to run! It is recommended to use windows 10

WinSTA.Title: WinSTA
WinSTA.Message: WinSTA system evaluation tool is detected to be running, the program will automatically disable aero. Do you want to stop it? (You can disable it forever in scheduled task)

FreeUser.Title: Free User
FreeUser.Message:
Free user cannot change the plugin, you can only use the default value.
After login, you can use all the plugins and change them at will!

Close.Title: Close
Close.Message: Are you sure you want to quit TurboHUD?

UpdateFailed.Title: Failed
UpdateFailed.Message: Download failed. Do you want to download manually?

FailedToDownloadFile.Title: error
FailedToDownloadFile.Message:
An error occurred while downloading the file
1. Due to anti-virus software or firewall blocking
2. The local network or regional network fails
3. The server is under maintenance
Please check it by yourself and try to download again

UnpackingFailed.Title: error
UnpackingFailed.Message:
An error occurred while unpacking the file
1. Due to the anti-virus software blocking file unpacking
2. The downloaded file is broken due to network problems
Please check it by yourself and try to download again

FixTTS.Title: TTS
FixTTS.Message:
Detected that your system is win7 compact version, TTS function is broken, this will cause the plugins cannot use TTS! 
Do you want to try to fix it?

DisableTTS.Title: TTS
DisableTTS.Message:
Detected that your system is win7 compact version, TTS function is broken, this will cause the plugins cannot use TTS! 
Do you want to disable TTS completely?

NoSpace.Message: Space is not allowed! All space characters have been removed

UserNameLength.Message: The length of the user name is 4-30 characters!

PasswordLength.Message: The length of the password is 4-30 characters!

ConfirmPasswordLength.Message: The length of the confirm password is 4-30 characters!

SuperPasswordLength.Message: The length of the Super password is 4-30 characters!

PasswordDonotMatch.Message: Your confirmed password and password do not match!

VerifyPasswordLength.Message: The length of the verify password is 4-30 characters!

NewPasswordLength.Message: The length of the new password is 4-30 characters!

LicenceLength.Message: Please fill in the correct licence!

BattleTag.Message: Please click [Battle.Net] to get the BattleTag

ResetBattleTag.Message:
Reset bound Battle.Net name will deduct 72 hours time left! 
Do you want to continue?

ForFreeLogin.Message:
Free user mode login will restore all plugins to initialization! 
Do you want to continue?

VirtualMachine.Message: Please register your account in the real system!

BindEmail.Title: Bind Email
BindEmail.Message: For your account security, please bind E-mail! Do you want to bind your E-mail now?

EmailCaptchaCode.Title: Security Code
EmailCaptchaCode.Message:
Please send the security code first, then check the security code in your Emailbox, and enter the security code here.
If the security code is not found in the Emailbox, please check the dustbin.

EmailCaptchaCodeSent.Title: security code
EmailCaptchaCodeSent.Message:
We have sent a security code to your e-mail address [{0}], Enter the security code here.
If the security code is not found in the Emailbox, please check the dustbin.

IncompleteInformation.Title: Incomplete information
IncompleteInformation.Message: Please fill in the complete information!

EmailCaptchaCodeTimedOut.Title: Timed Out
EmailCaptchaCodeTimedOut.Message: The Email security code timed out, Please resend code!

EmailCaptchaCodeInvalid.Title: Invalid
EmailCaptchaCodeInvalid.Message: The Email security code is invalid! Please check the security code in your Emailbox

EmailIsUsed.Title: The EMail is used
EmailIsUsed.Message: That Email address is already in use! Please change an Email and register again, or retrieve the original account through this Email address.

EmailIsUsedForRebind.Title: fail
EmailIsUsedForRebind.Message: This Email address has been bound to other account, please change a new Email address!

EmailIsNotBound.Title: fail
EmailIsNotBound.Message: The Email address is not bound to any user.

NotLoggedIn.Title: fail
NotLoggedIn.Message:
Not logged in successfully.
May be intercepted by antivirus software or firewall or other protective systems. 
Please add the directory where the program is located to the confession list / trust directory / exclusion directory

UserNameHasBeenUsed.Title: The user name is used
UserNameHasBeenUsed.Message: That user name is already in use! Please change the user name.

UserNameNotFound.Title: The user name not found
UserNameNotFound.Message: The user name not found, Please check again.

LicenseHasBeenUsed.Title: The license has been used
LicenseHasBeenUsed.Message: This license has been used and cannot be reused!

InvalidLicense.Title: Invalid license
InvalidLicense.Message:
{0} Invalid license! 
Please check again. It is recommended to copy and paste the license to avoid input errors

HWIDBanned.Title: HWID Banned
HWIDBanned.Message: Your HWID is banned! Please contact customer service for reasons.

InvalidUserName.Title: Invalid user name
InvalidUserName.Message: Sorry! The user name your entered does not exist!

InvalidPassword.Title: Invalid password
InvalidPassword.Message: Your password is incorrect. Please re-enter your password.

AccountBanned.Title: Account banned
AccountBanned.Message: This account has been banned, The reason for the ban is :{0}

AccountBannedForRenew.Title: Account banned
AccountBannedForRenew.Message: This account has been banned and cannot be renew!

AccountExpired.Title: Expired
AccountExpired.Message: Your account has expired, Please renew.

OldAndNewPasswordsAreSame.Title: fail
OldAndNewPasswordsAreSame.Message: The new password cannot be the same as the old password!

BindingSucceeded.Title: Binding succeeded
BindingSucceeded.Message: Account [{0}] is successfully bound to Email [{1}]

ResetBattleNetFailed.Title: fail
ResetBattleNetFailed.Message: Insufficient time left, You cannot reset bound Battle.Net Tag

ResetBattleNetSucceeded.Title: succeed
ResetBattleNetSucceeded.Message: Reset binding Battle.Net Tag succeeded! deduct : {0} hours！

AutoCastForFree.Message: Free user can't use Auto Cast Helper

ProfilesExportForFree.Title: Failed
ProfilesExportForFree.Message: Free user can't use Profiles Export!

ProfilesImportForFree.Title: Failed
ProfilesImportForFree.Message: Free user can't use Profiles Import!

UploadProfiles.Message: Are you sure you want to upload the local profiles file of {0} to the server?

DownloadProfiles.Message:
Are you sure you want to download the {0} profiles file from the server?”
After the download is successful, the local profiles file will be updated!

ProfilesFileDoesNotExist.Title: Failed
ProfilesFileDoesNotExist.Message: Profiles file does not exist, You have to upload it once!

GameVersion.Message:
Your game version:{0}，TurboHUD supported game version: {1}

Detected that your system is not installed Microsoft .NET Framework V{0},

OBS.Title: Aero
OBS.Message:
It has been detected that you are using obs. If Aero cannot be enabled, the game winodw will be black.
Please do not disable Aero in OBS settings.

Win7Home.Title: Aero
Win7Home.Message:
Detected that your Windows 7 system is home version, 
Do you want to start downloading special tool to enable Aero

Aero.Title: Aero
Aero.Message:
Detected that your Windows 7 Aero is not enabled yet, This will cause the game window to be black! 
Do you want to enable Aero now and switch the corresponding theme to solve the problem?

EnableAero.Title: Choose an aero theme
EnableAero.Message:
Please select any one of the aero desktop themes to load.
Please restart TurboHUD after loading the Aero theme!

SP1.Title: windows7 SP1
SP1.Message:
Detected that your Windows 7 system does not have service pack 1 patch installed!

Do you want to start downloading and installing the patch (need to restart the computer after installation)

KB2670838.Title: KB2670838
KB2670838.Message:
Detected that your Windows 7 system does not have KB2670838 patch installed!
Do you want to start downloading and installing the patch (need to restart the computer after installation)

StatTracker.Title: Stat Tracker Broken
StatTracker.Message:
It is detected that the stat tracker cache log files are broken due to illegal shutdown or other reasons
Do you want to fix the problem by deleting all stat tracker cache log files now?

GameDisplayMode.Title: Game display mode
GameDisplayMode.Message:
Please do not use full screen mode！
 Please switch to windowed or windowed (Fullscreen) mode

LaunchTheGameFirst.Title: D3 was not launched
LaunchTheGameFirst.Message: Please launch the game by windowed or windowed (full screen) frist!

PortOccupied.Title: Port occupied
PortOccupied.Message:
It is detected that your 8081 port is occupied or Winsock exception causes the TurboMGR to not work. 
Do you want to try to fix Winsock?

Exceptions.Title: Exceptions
Exceptions.Message:
Detected that TurboHUD contains problematic plugins, please check the exceptions log and feed back to community! 
Do you want to view the exceptions log?

VersionExpired.Title: Version expired
VersionExpired.Message: Your version has expired and cannot be used. Please update the version in time.

UnsupportedClient.Title: Unsupported Client
UnsupportedClient.Message: You are running a 32-bit D3 client, please switch to 64-bit client!

UnsupportedWindows.Title: Unsupported win7
UnsupportedWindows.Message: Sorry, due to some reasons, the Win7 system is no longer supported. Please upgrade your system to Win10 64bit(1607) or above.

SceneRevealDefault.Message: Do you want to restore the SceneReveal default values?

BOSSSpeakOutOfTown.Message:
After the plugin is disabled, "BOSS Speak Out Of Town" will also be disabled.
 Are you sure you want to disable it?

BOSSSpeakOutOfTown2.Message: The plugin needs to enable [Basics] [Rift info]

ReloadPlugins.Title: Reload Plugins
ReloadPlugins.Message: TurboHUD is running, If you want the changes to take effect, stop it and then restart it.

SwitchClient.Title: Switch Client
SwitchClient.Message: Do you want to switch the realm of TurboHUD? It will restart the program version switching and file download!

Window.Windows_CooldownSoundPlayer: Skill cooldown monitor(Only works on skills with CD)
Window.Windows_PlayerSkills: Player skill circle and pets circle
Window.Windows_InventoryLock: Drag and drop the mouse to select the area for inventory lock

GroupBox_Lightning_PopularTeam.text: Popular Team: Created by 我想静静

GroupBox_RunD3_2step.text: Step 2: create a standard system account

GroupBox_RunD3_SecondWay.text: Second way (step 1 game path must be set)

CheckBox_ParagonCapture.text:
Paragon capture
Saved in capture_paragon folder

CheckBox_OtherUI_SkillRangeHelper.text:
Skill range helper
(Hover over the skills bar)

CheckBox_Lightning_CrusaderFistoftheHeav.text:
Fist of the Heavens: When equipped Aegis of Valor set, keep 2p and 4p Buffs.
auto keep Restraint Buff

CheckBox_Lightning_CrusaderBombardment.text:
Bombardment: Cast when Barrels of Spikes rune and equipped Akkhan 6p, Invoker 2p, COE，
and monster within 30 yards, and COE less than 1s from physical.
Keep cast when used Akarat's Champion-Rally and equipped Akkhan 6p

CheckBox_Lightning_CrusaderSteedCharge.text:
SteedCharge: Keep buff when equipped Norvald's Fervor 2p and unhealthy monsters 
within 15 yards.

CheckBox_Lightning_CrusaderJudgment.text:
Judgment: Auto cast when elite within 20 yards of the cursor and not be passed judgment
keep cast Judgment when equipped Akkhan set in attack status

CheckBox_Lightning_CrusaderPhalanx.text: Phalanx: cast when attacking the enemy with Akkhan set

CheckBox_Lightning_CrusaderJustice.text: Justice: Keep Focus Buff when any monsters within 30 yards of the cursor

CheckBox_Lightning_CrusaderBlessedShield.text: Blessed Shield: Auto aim and cast when Akkhan's Leniency count 100 stacks and will expire

CheckBox_Lightning_CrusaderFallingSword.text: Falling Sword: Auto cast when equipped with Faithful Memory and any monster within 14 yards of the cursor

CheckBox_Lightning_CrusaderShieldGlare.text: Shield Glare: Blinding elite enemies within skill range during COE

CheckBox_PopularTeam_Nec_Aoe.text: Necromancer auto fight in the progress phase

CheckBox_PopularTeam_Crusader_BOSS.text: Crusader auto fight in boss phase

CheckBox_PopularTeam_SupportBarbarian_BO.text: Support Barbarian auto fight in boss phase

CheckBox_PopularTeam_SupportBarbarian_bu.text: Support Barbarian keep Buff for party

CheckBox_Lightning_WitchDoctorTeam.text: Spirit Barrage WD: Created by Flower

CheckBox_Lightning_OpenChest_Shrine.text: GR        and below pylons, Rift pylons,All Shrines

CheckBox_Lightning_UpgradeLegendaryGem.text:
Upgrade Legendary Gem: Auto start and upgrade when the first grid in the 
inventory is legendary gem and do town portal

CheckBox_Lightning_CloseQuestDialog.text: Auto close quest dialog: Event,Quest,Rift Reward(Must be set <Close All Open Windows> key)

CheckBox_Lightning_CloseDialog.text: Auto close story dialog: Skip all story dialog(Must be set <Close All Open Windows> key)

CheckBox_Lightning_AutoSkill.text:
Auto skill cast: Add a switch to the upper right corner of each skill.
When hover is enabled, cast immediately after cooldown.No casting in town or actioning
You can choose LightningMOD general rules plugins or this plugin

CheckBox_Lightning_OpenGreatRift.text:
Auto open great rift: Keep creating the game → enter the 
great rift → exit the game, Stop until you find the right game

CheckBox_Lightning_KanaiCube_ConvertMate.text: Convert material: First open the cube page 7~9

CheckBox_Lightning_KanaiCube_UpgradeRare.text: Upgrade rare to lengendary: First open the cube page 3

CheckBox_Lightning_KanaiCube_UpgradeToAn.text: Reforge to                        : First open the cube page 2

CheckBox_Lightning_Kadala.text: Speed purchase: Mouse over the item in the store

CheckBox_Lightning_Salvage.text: Auto Salvage: Salvage all items not in inventory lock area

CheckBox_AdvancedSalvage_SalvageWhisperO.text:
Auto salvage Whisper of Atonement 
below level 125

CheckBox_Lightning_Frailty.text: Frailty: Auto cast low health elite within cursor range

CheckBox_Lightning_NecLeech.text:
Leech-Blood Flask: After the altar unlock the potion Buff and cast it when there are elites or bosses near 
cursor within 19 yard that are not cursed

CheckBox_Lightning_NecDecrepify.text: Decrepify: cast it when there are elites or bosses near cursor within 19 yard that are not cursed

CheckBox_Lightning_NecRevive.text: Revive: Cast when equipped Rathma 2p and revived minions less than 10 and there's a corpse near the cursor

CheckBox_Lightning_NecArmyoftheDead.text: Army of the Dead: Cast when there is elite or boss or enough progress monsters near the cursor

CheckBox_Lightning_NecBloodRush.text:
Blood Rush-Molting: Cast when equipped Devour-Voracious , Bone Spear, and cursor within 50 yards only 
for BOSS

CheckBox_Lightning_NecNayrsBlackDeath.text:
Nayr's Black Death: Auto keep Bone Spear, Bone Armor, Skeletal Mage, Siphon Blood, Death Nova, 
Command Skeletons, Revive, Bone Spikes poison bonus Buff.

CheckBox_Lightning_NecCommandSkeletons.text:
Command Skeletons: When selected BOSS activate, When equipped Bloodsong Mail, then activate 
duringin Land Of The Dead (Except for poison rune),When equipped Jesseth set and selected monster 
activate, when Enforcer rune and equipped Obsidian continuous Click.

CheckBox_Lightning_NecSkeletalMage.text:
Skeletal Mage: When Singularity rune or equipped Razeth's Volition, Give priority skeletons then summon 
power skeleton to replace it, summon power skeleton when cursor on elite.
When Skeleton Archer rune and unequipped Razeth's Volition and Aquila 
Cuirass Activated keep attack speed buff during the BOSS battle.

CheckBox_Lightning_NecBoneArmor.text:
Bone Armor: Except Limited Immunity rune, There are monsters within 30 yards then cast,
When Thy Flesh Sustained rune and do not cast health less than 50%, and do not cast equipped 
Grace of Inarius set. When rats equipped Scythe of the Cycle keep cast.
When Dislocation rune and equipped Krysbin and COE, then cast during COE outbreak.

CheckBox_Lightning_NecLandOfTheDead.text:
Land Of The Dead: Keep buff when Simulacrum is in effect, it is cast in           to          seconds(Do not cast 
equipped Haunted Visions),When equipped Pestilence Master 6p and Captain Crimson 3p and  
Messerschmidt or Blood is Power. Keep buff when you are znec

CheckBox_Lightning_NecSimulacrum.text:
Simulacrum: Cast when equipped Haunted Visions and quantity is insufficient. Cast when Land Of The 
Dead effect is in 1s, Cast when CD less than Buff time +           s.

CheckBox_Lightning_NecDevour.text:
Devour: Cast when dead body around or Land Of The Dead is in effect and monster around or 
Health or resource is insufficient.

CheckBox_Lightning_DemonHunterStrafeHung.text:
GOD macro: Keep Gears of Dreadlands set 2p BUFF and hole Strafe, 
you can switch to high frequency mode, cast more primary skill.
note:allow to keep only hold Strafe when without GOD set

CheckBox_Lightning_DemonHunterRainofVeng.text: Caltrops: Cast once when equipped Natalya 2p and casting Spike Trap and BOSS or Elite is within 12 yards

CheckBox_Lightning_Sentry.text: Sentry: Cast keep Full quantity Sentry when equipped Embodiment of the Marauder 6p

CheckBox_Lightning_DemonHunterImpale.text: Impale: Keep Chain of Shadows Buff when equipped Vault.

CheckBox_Lightning_DemonHunterVengeance.text:
Vengeance: When Dark Heart,Side Cannons rune, then cast health less then 60%, 
Cast when equipped Dawn or Obsidian and elite is nearby, 
Cast when CDR Above 29% and monster around, Keep Buff when CDR above 36%,
Cast when Seethe rune and Hatred less than 30.

CheckBox_Lightning_DemonHunterCompanion.text:
Companion: Keep Buff when CDR above 69% or equipped Obsidian,Otherwise wolf, boar,spider cast only 
when elite or BOSS is nearby, Cast when Ferret and health less than 60% and health globe is nearby, 
Cast when bat and Hatred less than 15%, When any party member equipped COE, then wolf cast 
possible during COE bursts(Give priority to your).

CheckBox_Lightning_DemonHunterFanofKnive.text: Fan of Knives - Bladed Armor: Keep Buff when CDR above 40%, Otherwise cast monster in 40 yards.

CheckBox_Lightning_DemonHunterEvasiveFir.text:
Hungering Arrow, Bolas or Evasive Fire: Keep Bastions of Will Buff when Hardened, Focus rune and 
when any monster is near the cursor and it will keep Wraps of Clarity Buff.
Evasive Fire: Keep Bastions of Will Buff when Hardened, Focus rune cast when Hatred less than 20% 
and cast when equipped Unhallowed Essence set 2p and Discipline insufficient.

CheckBox_Lightning_DemonHunterChakramShu.text: Chakram Shuriken Cloud - Shuriken Cloud: Keep Buff

CheckBox_Lightning_DemonHunterPreparatio.text: Preparation - Other runes: Cast when Discipline Consumed        , Cast when Battle Scars and health less than 40%.
Preparation - Punishment: Cast when Hatred insufficient

CheckBox_Lightning_DemonHunterShadowPowe.text:
Shadow Power: Cast when in danger, Activate when equipped The 
Shadow’s Mantle set 4p, Keep Buff when equipped Gears of Dreadlands
 set 6p or Unhallowed Essence set 6p.

CheckBox_Lightning_DemonHunterSmokeScree.text:
Smoke Screen: Cast when in danger, Activate when equipped Elusive Ring,
Cast when equipped Gears of Dreadlands set 6p and monster is around,
Cast when Displacement rune and RCR above 40%.

CheckBox_Lightning_CrusaderAkaratsChampi.text:
Akarats Champion: Cast when resource less than 20% or elite/Boss in 40 yards,
Keep Buff when CDR above 75% or (50% and equipped Akkhan set 4p or equipped Obsidian or  Akarat's 
Awakening). Cast when you are Aegis of Valor Split Fury build and COE During the holy.

CheckBox_Lightning_CrusaderCondemn.text: Condemn: Cast when have enough resources and monster is around.

CheckBox_Lightning_CrusaderProvoke.text:
Provoke: Cast when in danger or resources less than monster's resources amount, Cast when CDR 
above 50%,Cast when Bombardment Crusader activated Reflective Skin.

CheckBox_Lightning_CrusaderLawsOfValor.text: Laws Of Valor: Keep Buff when equipped Long Arm of the Law or CDR above 50% or equipped Obsidian.

CheckBox_Lightning_CrusaderLawsOfJustice.text:
Laws Of Justice: Cast when any party member in danger.
Keep Buff when equipped Long Arm of the Law or CDR above 50% or equipped Obsidian.

CheckBox_Lightning_CrusaderLawsOfHope.text:
Laws Of Hope: Cast when any party member in danger.
Keep Buff when equipped Long Arm of the Law or CDR above 50% or equipped Obsidian.

CheckBox_Lightning_CrusaderIronSkin.text:
Iron Skin: Cast when in danger, Keep Buff when CDR above 50% or equipped Obsidian. 
Cast when Reflective Skin and equipped COE, monster within 30 yards and COE less than 3s from physical.
Keep cast when used Akarat's Champion-Rally and equipped Akkhan 6p

CheckBox_Lightning_BarbarianWrathOfTheBe.text:
Wrath Of The Berserker: Keep Buff when equipped Immortal King 4p or equipped Boon of Bul-Kathos 
and CDR above 75% or equipped Obsidian or equipped Messerschmidt,Otherwise only cast when 
elite/Boss is nearby or health less than 30%.

CheckBox_Lightning_BarbarianRend.text: Rend: Cast every 3-4s when there are more than 5 monsters in the skill range

CheckBox_Lightning_BarbarianOverPower.text:
Over Power: Keep Buff when Killing Spree,Crushing Advance rune,
Cast when Momentum rune and Fury less than 30 and more than 5 monsters are around,
Other runes cast when monster is around.

CheckBox_Lightning_BarbarianAncientSpear.text:
AncientS pear - Boulder Toss: Cast when equipped Raekor 6p, Arreat's Law and casting Weapon Throw to 
accumulate fury to the maximum

CheckBox_Lightning_BarbarianSeismicSlam.text:
Seismic Slam - Rumble: Cast when equipped Immortal King 6p + Raekor 4p and Wrath of the 
Berserker on cooldown and Fury above 98% to make Obsidian effective, 
Keep Bastions of Will Buff.

CheckBox_Lightning_BarbarianBandofMight.text:
Band of Might: Keep Buff try cast Furious Charge, Leap, Ground Stomp,
(This plugin has no effect on support barbarian)

CheckBox_Lightning_BarbarianWhirlwind.text:
Whirlwind:Auto hold Whirlwind or lock the healthiest monster in the cursor area
(Not including the Minion)

CheckBox_Lightning_BarbarianIgnorePain.text:
Ignore Pain: Cast when in danger, Cast when Mob Rule rune and all party member within 50 yards,
Force cast when any party member have Stone Gauntlets deBuff,
Keep Buff when Other runes and equipped Pride of Cassius  or Obsidian or Messerschmidt 
or Wrath of the Wastes set 6p

CheckBox_Lightning_BarbarianCallOfTheAnc.text:
Call Of The Ancients: Keep Buff when equipped Immortal King set 2p,
Otherwise cast when elite/Boss is nearby and health less than 50%.

CheckBox_Lightning_BarbarianWarCry.text:
War Cry: Kepp Buff,
Cast when equipped Chilanik's Chain and all party member within 100 yards,
Give priority to party member Buff.

CheckBox_Lightning_BarbarianSprint.text:
Sprint: Cast when Forced March rune and all party member within 50 yards,
Keep Buff when other runes and running.

CheckBox_Lightning_BarbarianThreateningS.text:
Threatening Shout: Cast when elite/Boss or 10 monsters within 25 yards,
Cast when Grim Harvest rune and within 25 yards from party and monsters(10 monster or elite/Boss)

CheckBox_Lightning_WitchDoctorWallOfDeat.text:
Wall of Death: Automatically cast Communing with Spirits runes on elites or bosses within 19 yards while keep 
the Helltooth 6p Buff

CheckBox_Lightning_WitchDoctorLocustSwar.text: Locust Swarm: Auto aim and cast when any elite is not affected by the swarm within 19 yards

CheckBox_Lightning_WitchDoctorPiranhas.text: Piranhas-Piranhado: Cast when elite/Boss or 3 monsters within 12 yards of the cursor

CheckBox_Lightning_WitchDoctorSpiritWalk.text:
Spirit Walk: Keep Buff when equipped Mundunugu set 4p.
keep buff when using Severance rune and equipped Shukrani's Triumph

CheckBox_Lightning_WitchDoctorCorpseSpid.text: Corpse Spiders - Spider Queen: Cast when Spider Queen disappears.

CheckBox_Lightning_WitchDoctorHorrify.text:
Horrify: Cast when 5 monsters or elite/Boss within skill range,
Cast when equipped Obsidian and monster is around,
Cast when Frightening Aspect and monster within 50 yards

CheckBox_Lightning_WitchDoctorSpiritBarr.text: Spirit Barrage - Phantasm: Cast when Phantasm quantity less than 3 within 60 yards and Force Move not pressed.

CheckBox_Lightning_WitchDoctorHex.text: Hex: Keep Buff when equipped Arachyr set 4p.

CheckBox_Lightning_WitchDoctorBigBadVood.text:
Big Bad Voodoo: Cast when equipped Starmetal Kukri and fetish is around or equipped Grave Injustice 
and elite/Boss is nearby, or keep Buff when equipped Mundunugu set 2p and equipped Grave Injustice

CheckBox_Lightning_WitchDoctorMassConfus.text: Mass Confusion: Cast when elite/Boss or 3 monsters within 18 yards.

CheckBox_Lightning_WitchDoctorSoulHarves.text: Soul Harvest: Cast when elite/Boss or 3 monsters within 18 yards.

Soul Harvest - Jade Harvester: Cast when equipped Jade Harvester set 6p and any monster within 18 
yards around affected by Haunt, Cast when equipped Ring of Emptiness and any monster effected by 
Haunt and Locust, Priority to keep Jade Harvester Buff.

CheckBox_Lightning_WitchDoctorFetishArmy.text: Fetish Army: Cast when equipped Zunimassa set 2p and Fetish insufficient quantity.

CheckBox_Lightning_WitchDoctorGargantuan.text: Gargantuan: Cast when elite/Boss within 40 yards or health less than 50%.

CheckBox_Lightning_WitchDoctorZombieDogs.text:
Zombie Dogs: Cast when Zombie Dogs quantity less than          or equipped The Tall Man's Finger and 
Zombie Dogs disappear.

CheckBox_Lightning_MonkTempestRush.text:
Tempest Rush: Auto hold Tempest Rush or lock the healthiest monster in the cursor area
(Not including the Minion)

CheckBox_Lightning_MonkCripplingWave.text: Crippling Wave: When useing Way Of The Hundred Fists to keep Combination Strike buff

CheckBox_Lightning_MonkDeadlyReach.text:
Deadly Reach: When useing Way Of The Hundred Fists or Crippling Wave to keep Combination Strike buff
or keep Foresight rune buff
Fists of Thunder: When useing Way Of The Hundred Fists or Crippling Wave to keep Combination Strike buff

CheckBox_Lightning_MonkWayOfTheHundredFi.text:
Way of the Hundred Fists: When useing Crippling Wave to keep Combination Strike buff
or keep Blazing Fists or Assimilation rune buff

CheckBox_Lightning_MonkDashingStrike.text:
Dashing Strike: Keep the buff for Blinding Speed or Radiance rune when the Boss is within 20 yards
When useing Way Of The Hundred Fists or Crippling Wave to keep Raiment of a Thousand Storms 6p buff

CheckBox_Lightning_MonkMysticAlly.text:
Mystic Ally: Cast when Air Ally rune and Spirit less than 50, Cast when Enduring Ally rune and health less 
than 30%, Cast when Water or Earth Ally rune and more than 1 monsters or elite/Boss around, 
Cast when Fire Ally rune and any nmonster has Lesser Gods debuff or COE is in the fire cycle

CheckBox_Lightning_MonkSweepingWind.text: Sweeping Wind: Keep Buff when enough resources.

CheckBox_Lightning_MonkBreathOfHeaven.text:
Breath Of Heaven: Cast when any party member health less than 70% within 12 yards, 
Cast when Blazing Wrath rune and elite/Boss within 40 yards,
Cast when Zephyr rune and CDR above 65% and  equipped Obsidian or CDR above 74%,
Cast when Infused with Light rune and CDR above 65% and equipped Obsidian or CDR above 74% and 
Spirit less than 50%.

CheckBox_Lightning_MonkSerenity.text:
Serenity: Cast when health less than 60% or health potion on cooldown and health less than 80%,
Cast when Tranquility rune and CDR above 70% and Support the priority protection of Witch Doctor, 
CNecromancer, and the Crusader.

CheckBox_Lightning_MonkMantraOfConvictio.text:
Mantra Of Conviction: Keep Buff when Epiphany is activated and not idle,
Keep Buff elite/Boss is nearby and enough resources.

CheckBox_Lightning_MonkAutoFight.text:
Auto Fight:
Auto attack when in GR progress(Use Crippling Wave first, then Deadly Reach)
Auto move to a good position around boss and fight(Use Deadly Reach first, then Crippling Wave)

CheckBox_Lightning_MonkMantraOfHealing.text:
Mantra Of Healing:Keep Buff when not idle and monster is around and Spirit above 90%.
(Priority keep Aquila Cuirass Buff)
Cast when any party member the shield buff disappear and Spirit above 50%,
DPS priority protection when Spirit less than 30%.

CheckBox_Lightning_MonkMantraOfSalvation.text: Mantra Of Salvation: Keep Buff when not idle and monster is around.

CheckBox_Lightning_MonkCycloneStrike.text:
Cyclone Strike: Cast when Soothing Breeze rune and attacking monster within 50 yards(Do not cast when 
Spawning BOSS), Keep Buff when other runes and equipped Lefebvre's Soliloquy,
 Cast when equipped Bindings of the Lesser Gods for debuff, Cast when there are 5 fire bells around (27 seasons only)

CheckBox_Lightning_MonkInnerSanctuary.text: Inner Sanctuary:Cast when attacking and BOSS or 5 monsters within 50 yards.

CheckBox_Lightning_MonkBlindingFlash.text:
Blinding Flash: Cast when attacking and 5 monsters or elite within 20 yards,
Do not cast when only BOSS is nearby.
Cast when equipped The Laws of Seph and resources < 20%

CheckBox_Lightning_MonkEpiphany.text: Epiphany: Keep Buff when idle and monster is around.

CheckBox_Lightning_WizardArchonArcaneBla.text: Archon - Arcane Blast: Cast when monster is around.

CheckBox_Lightning_WizardArchon.text:
Wizard Archon: Cast when equipped Chantodo set and           stacks.
If possible will cast Black Hole first.

CheckBox_Lightning_WizardBlackHole.text:
Black Hole: Cast when Absolute Zero rune or Spellsteal rune and equipped COE and elites or bosses are 
nearby and COE less than 1s from highest element. If you are not equipped with COE or equipped with 
Stone of Jordan, cast when there are elites or bosses within 10 yards of the cursor.

CheckBox_Lightning_WizardHydra.text:
Hydra: Cast when equipped Serpent's Sparker and Typhon set 4p and 5 stacks Arcane Dynamo within 
the cursor area near any monster in the Blizzard range.

CheckBox_Lightning_WizardMirrorImage.text:
Mirror Image: When equipped Firebird's Finery 6p and Elite or boss or more than 10 monsters within 15 
yards, Cast in the appropriate COE cycle

CheckBox_Lightning_WizardTriumvirate.text: Triumvirate: Cast a Signature spell to keep Triumvirate Buff

CheckBox_Lightning_WizardDiamondSkin.text:
Diamond Skin: Keep buff when Enduring Skin rune and CDR60%, Other runes require additional 
equipped Obsidian or Messerschmidt. Always keep buff when In-geom is activated

CheckBox_Lightning_WizardDisintegrate.text:
Disintegrate:Cast when equipped Firebird's Finery 6p and not running, The combustion stacks Above 1 
and below           . Cast when the Taeguk buff about to expire and Pylon or BOSS or Elite is nearby

CheckBox_Lightning_WizardBlizzard.text:
Blizzard: Cast when equipped Winter Flurry and monster not affected by Blizzard and at least one Hydra 
within cursor area.

CheckBox_Lightning_WizardFrostNova.text:
Frost Nova: Cast when monster within 16 yards(won't cast when BOSS war in multiplayer game)
Cast when Deep Freeze rune and 5 monsters are around.

CheckBox_Lightning_WizardExplosiveBlast.text: Explosive Blast: Cast when monster is around.

CheckBox_Lightning_WizardArcaneOrb.text: Arcane Orb - Arcane Orbit: Cast when Arcane Orbit disappear.

CheckBox_Lightning_DrinkHealthPotion.text:
Auto drink health potion: STD:       %,HC:       %,In danger zone:       %
Use potion to activate Buff when activated the Legendary Potion Powers at Altar of Rites

Hexing Pants of Mr. Yan,
Dayntee's Binding,
Simulacrum,Ignore Pain,
Oculus Ring,
Squirt's Necklace,
Flying Dragon

Who operated the Pylon, Shrine, 
PoolOfReflection and Obelisk

Show pain enhancer Count
 and attack speed bonus

CheckBox_PlayerEvents_RequestBoxWarning.text: Request Box Warning: When the game is not active, speak alert.

CheckBox_PlayerEvents_BOSSSpeakOutOfTown.text: BOSS Speak Out Of Town: BOSS generated，Rift completion, speak alert.

CheckBox_GeneralEvents_BeenToRecord.text: Been to record on map (Including party members)

CheckBox_GeneralEvents_PoolsForMemberIsR.text: Pools & Shrines & Pylons for member is ready

CheckBox_GeneralEvents_PowerGlobe_TTS.text: Speak for Power globe in GR

CheckBox_GeneralEvents_PowerGlobeSpeak.text: Speak warning Power globe explosion         s in advance

CheckBox_NecCommandSkeletonsMDPB_Enabled.text: Nec Command Skeletons bonus (Bone Ringer, Bloodsong Mail)

CheckBox_BaneOfTheStricken.text: Bane Of The Stricken count for BOSS in GR

CheckBox_LegendGemCircle_Zei.text: Zei's Stone of Vengeance full bonus circle

CheckBox_ShieldOfFuryStacks.text: Shield Of Fury stacks for elite/Boss in GR

CheckBox_CursorOnMonster_Enabled.text: Highlight or show circle for selected monster

CheckBox_MonsterRiftProgression_DyingEna.text: Dying monsters with less than           % health marked in red

Label_Register_LicenceTips.text: You must use a new license to create a new account

Label_Register_EmailTips.text: You can retrieve the account information by email

Label_Lightning_WitchDoctorTeam_Tips.text:
Move the cursor to the bottom left corner of the game to see the details when the plugin is enabled 
This plugin support speak, Spirit Barrage and Soul Harvest,
Please disable other similar speak  functions to avoid conflicts

Label_PopularTeam_SupportBarbarian_BOSS_.text: Cast Ground Stomp when elemental fire for        s

Label_Lightning_PopularTeam_Tips.text:
The macros in this page are customized and optimized for the popular team build of leaderboards.
Do not use with hero class macro  to avoid mutual interference

Label_Lightning_Pickup_Whitelist.text:
One item name per line (for example:"Primal Ancient Set The Compass Rose" or "The Compass Rose")
The items on this list will be tried to pick

Label_Lightning_Pickup_Blacklist.text:
One item name per line (for example:"Primal Ancient Set The Compass Rose" or "The Compass Rose")
The items on this list will not try to pick up

Label_AdvancedSalvage_Whitelist.text:
One item name per line (for example:"Primal Ancient Set The Compass Rose" or "The Compass Rose")
The items on this list will not be salvaged

Label_AdvancedSalvage_Blacklist.text: One item name per line (for example:"Primal Ancient Set The Compass Rose" or "The Compass Rose").The items on this list will be salvaged regardless of the above rules.

Label_Lightning_PopularTeam_link.text: Instructions and feedback of macro on this page

Label_Lightning_Readme.text:
1.LightningMOD is a private developed third party MOD based on TurboHUD,It can appropriately reduce the click frequency and skill use efficiency, This MOD is not approved by Blizzard, please bear its own risk

2.LightningMOD can intelligently cast skills through the data API provided by TurboHUD and the special API of LightningMOD(Related source code \TurboHUD\plugins\LightningMod)

3.It pauses When a common UI window pops up(For example inventory),Or enter chat,Or casting (For example transferring),Except for longer time buffs, most of skills will not be casted in towns

4.Due to limited personal energy, it is impossible to optimize all class heros builds, If you have any good suggestions, please feedback in the community.

5.All developers are requested not to develop plugins with transition automation,In particular, do not develop robot related plugins, Otherwise, the plugin will be masked

6.If the left and right skill cannot be cast, please close the anti-virus software.

7.The popular team macros and single skill macros are independent of each other. The popular team macros are customized for the GreatRift. Usually, it contains macros for most skills, Therefore, please judge whether to use the popular team macros or the general single skill rule macro for hero class.

8.If you use a non English keyboard layout when starting, it may lead to macro cast failure

Label_Lightning_ThrowItem_Tips.text: Auto throw all items not in the inventory lock and armoryset to the ground

Label_Lightning_Crusader_Tips.text: Crusader all skill do not cast when riding (Individual exceptions)

Label_Lightning_MonkTempestRush_FlurrySt.text: Release when Flurry rune and stacks above         and monster within 15 yards

Label_CooldownSoundPlayer_Tips.text: The sound file must be a wav file and in the root directory\TurboHUD\Sounds\, You can add it yourself

Label_BuffManager_RedFrame.text: Turns red frame when          %of the countdown is leftBuff

Label_BuffManager_Tips.text: Part of it is the countdown(Such as false death skills)or ICD(Such as the Oculus)

Label_PlayerSkills_Pets_Necromancer_Tips.text: Skeletal mage,Revive Unable to make timer work

Label_ForgetAccount_Tips.text: Send the bound username and password, super password, BattleTag and other information to the email

Label_LoginBattleNet_Refresh.text: If you can't get the BattleTag, please click the

Label_MyAccount_Renew_LicenceTips.text: You must use a new license to create a new account

Label_BindEmail_Tips.text: In order to improve the security of the account, avoid losing the account

Label_InventoryLock_Tips.text: Check the options below to make the inventory lock effective for these plugins

Label_RunStats_UptimeHelper.text: More necessary buff uptime statistics, please feedback in the community

Label_SpecialBounty_Tips.text:
One bounty name for each line(Fuzzy)
When the bounty in this list is not completed, it will be displayed next to the minimap

Label_ChatsMonitor_Tips.text:
Each line is a keyword (* are wildcards)
It will flash and speak when the chat content is matched

Label_ShrineAndPool_Tips.text:
If you don't need to speak, please fill blank
"Default" or "@" is the speaking default name

Label_Goblin_Tips.text:
If you don't need to speak, please fill blank
"Default" or "@" is the speaking default name

Label_DangerousMonster_Tips.text: One monster name per line (exact match)

Label_DangerousAffixMonster_Tips.text: Elites with checked affixes will be shown in red on the minimap

Label_RunD3_Readme_Tips.text:
1.General launch: Skip battle. Net direct launch game, support multiple games.

2.Separate launch: Through the new limited account to reduce the game rights to achieve the purpose of anti scanning, Because this mode is based on Windows system, it can not guarantee that everyone can use it correctly, and there may be some permission problems in this mode. Games running in this mode can improve the security of your account, but you can never be 100% secure.

Label_RunD3_3step_Tips.text:
Please enter the account password manually when the 
computer starts up. When entering, the password is hidden.

Label_RunD3_2step_Tips.text:
It only needs to be created once
The default settings are recommended

Label_RunD3_FirstWay_Tips.text:
1.Click on the upper left corner of battle. Net to select "Settings"
2.Click"Game  Settings"
3.select "Diablo III"
4.Do not check"Launch 32-bit client (instead of 64-bit)"
5.Go back to Battle.Net to launch the game

Label_RunD3_1step_Tips.text: If you don't know what this is, please keep the default setting, which is mainly used forced choice of global service region

Label_InternalDownload_Tips.text: If the downloader fails, you can try manually

Label_SpecialMonster_Tips.text: Only need to match one of Name Localized and Name English, The default is Chinese only

Label_EliteMonsterAffix_Tips.text:
If the elite contains the checked affix, it will be displayed on the elite. 
This plugin should not be enabled at the same time as the Monster Pack

Label_MonsterPack_Tips.text:
If the elite pack contains the checked affix, it will be displayed on the elite leader. 
This plugin should not be enabled at the same time as the Elite Monster Affix

Label_COE_MyHighestElement.text: My highest element:                                This selection also applies to the highest element in the macros

Label_MonsterDensity_BaseYardAndMinimum.text: Count the area density radius          yards, density is not less than          monsters

Label_Downloader_Tips.text: It is recommended to add the directory to the whitelist of antivirus software to avoid file update failure

TextBox_Readme.text:
Legal

TurboHUD is not affiliated to Activision Blizzard and it may go against game TOS/EULA: Blizzard Entertainment: Battle.net End User License Agreement
Diablo is a registered trademark of Blizzard Entertainment, Inc.

Since TurboHUD was introduced I haven't got any notification from Blizzard regarding TurboHUD. Active Diablo 3 players posted multiple questions on official battle.net forums asking for an official statement without any clear conclusion. When a statement from Blizzard /or a legal C&D letter/ forbids the release of TurboHUD then it will be immediately removed from the Internet and the development will be halted.

In the meanwhile TurboHUD is accessible as-is, free for every player, only for non-competetive gameplay, and serves as a gameplay-experience enchancement.

The features of this software:1.automatic update
2.Integrating excellent plugins
3.Customization of plugins
4.Automatic problem solving
5.Profiles management
7.Added LightningMOD, Contains a large of automation plugins
8.Support multi games

TurboHUD Required:
1. Be sure to have at least Microsoft .NET Framework 4.7.2
2. Be sure to have at least DirectX11
3. Windows 7 users have to install Windows 7 SP1, Platform Update and KB2670838
4. Windows 7 users have to enable Aero


LightningMOD:http://d3fz.com
TurboHUD:http://www.ownedcore.com/forums/diablo-3/turbohud/
TurboHUD author:KillerJohn
